title: Stumblebum
text: Rothenberg's tour de force among her many figurative prints, <I>Stumblebum<I> blurs the line between drawing and printmaking. This monumental lithograph of 1985-86 was produced from 12 separate color plates in black, grey, silver and pink.
creditline: The Fiduciary Fund and Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Council
